ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) packet Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix
6 pork loin rib chops, about 1 inch thick
fresh cracked black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Bring pork chops to room temperature before cooking for even doneness
Use a meat thermometer to ensure internal temperature reaches 145°F
Let pork rest 3 minutes after cooking before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Would you like suggestions for sides that pair well with ranch-seasoned pork?
